original_text:
A bruised reed he will not break,
    and a smoldering wick he will not snuff out,
till he has brought justice through to victory.
korean_text: 상한 갈대를 꺾지 아니하며 꺼져가는 심지를 끄지 아니하기를 심판하여 이길 때까지 하리니

sentences.original_text: A bruised reed he will not break
and a smoldering wick he will not snuff out
till he has brought justice through to victory
